Washington Post journalists walk off jobs in one-day strike  —  Journalists at The Washington Post walked off their jobs in a one-day strike Thursday.  —  More than 750 staff members at the Post walked out, refusing to work for 24 hours in what they say is the “biggest labor protest at the company” in 48 years.
